I checked my calendar and you COULD HAVE bragged about
Canada day 3 days ago, but it's too late now.  Of
course I can't brag about anything because my dad got
sick on the way to the fireworks an we had to come
home, so it basically ruined the whole day (except for
the few people firing them off from their yard).
